overview: The movie depicts the last days of life of photographer Gabriela Liffschitz, who went into a coma the following day after the shooting and died two days later, on February 13, 2004, as a result of breast cancer. Liffschitz, who knew that he was affected by a terminal breast cancer film project along with Enrique Piñeyro, assuming you had a few months to live.
title: Bye Bye Life
